text: One Love is the fourth studio album by French DJ David Guetta. It was first released in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2009 by Virgin Records. It was Guetta's first major international album. ==Reviews== The album had positive reviews from music critics. This was a commercial success, selling over 3 million copies globally. It spawned a total of six worldwide hit singles throughout 2009 and 2010, most notably "When Love Takes Over" featuring American recording artist Kelly Rowland, "Sexy Bitch" featuring Senegalese- American R&B; singer Akon, and "Who's That Chick?" featuring Barbadian recording artist Rihanna. Since the album's release it has been reissued several times to include unreleased tracks and other bonus material. ==Track listing== *All songs written and produced by David Guetta. Additional producers and lyricists listed. ===One Love=== ===One More Love=== ==Other websites== One Love at Metacritic ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:David Guetta albums Category:Virgin Records albums
title: One Love (David Guetta album)
